data.title: Derby Recreation Commission, KS - Official Website
data.text:
WHO WE ARE

The DRC is comprised of facility staff, programming staff, and administration. These departments entail Guest Services (Customer Service, Coordinators, Childcare), Fitness (Specialist, Instructors, and Personal Trainers), Maintenance (Janitorial, Outdoor, Ball Fields), Aquatics (Lifeguards, WSI, Fitness Instructors), Sports (Supervisors, Officials, Umpires, Instructors), Art (Instructors), Wellness (Instructors), Special Events (Camp leaders, Rec Leaders), Administration (Bookkeeping, IT, HR, Marketing), and Directors.

The DRC hires for various positions all year round. Hiring is especially heavy in the March-April time frame, as numerous summer/seasonal positions are filled.
